recentPosts.title: TailwindCSS Fundamental
recentPosts.description: TailwindCSS is a framework like no other. Rather than constraining you to a set design, it gives you the tools and the standardization to build exactly what you want.

recentPosts.title: Contentful Fundamental
recentPosts.description: While using traditional CMS architecture has been the standard, companies are now looking for increased flexibility and scalability provided by headless CMS solutions. Learn about the difference between [headless CMS](https://contentful.com "Contentful") versus decoupled CMS architecture and why enterprises are embracing content infrastructure.
